```{r, cache=TRUE}

library(readxl)

```

```{r}
tb1 = as.tibble(tb1)
tb2 = as.tibble(tb2)
table(tb1$ProgramYear)
table(tb2$ProgramYear)
```

```{r}

table(tb2$`Evaluation Date`)

```

```{r}

table(tb2$`Claim Type`)
```

```{r}
u1=unique(tb1$`Claim Type`)

```

```{r}

table(tb2$`Settlement Type`)
```

```{r}
tb1$rowID <- seq.int(nrow(tb1))
tb2$rowid <- seq.int(nrow(tb2))
names(tb2)[names(tb2)=="rowid"] = "rowID"
```

```{r}
tb1 = tb1[,c(118,1:117)]
tb2 = tb2[,c(118,1:117)]
```


```{r}
library(dplyr)
```


Keeping the following Claim Types only:  Temp Disability, Future Medical, Indemnity and Death. 
```{r}
tb1 = filter(tb1, `Claim Type` %in% c("Temp Disability","Future Medical"))
tb2 = filter(tb2, `Claim Type` %in% c("Temp Disability","Future Medical", "Indemnity", "Death"))
```


Delete data that has program year 1994-1995 or prior.
```{r}
tb2 = filter(tb2, ProgramYear %in% c("1995-1996","1996-1997", "1997-1998","1998-1999","1999-2000","2000-2001","2001-2002","2002-2003","2003-2004","2004-2005","2005-2006","2006-2007","2007-2008","2008-2009","2009-2010","2010-2011","2011-2012","2012-2013","2013-2014","2014-2015","2015-2016","2016-2017","2017-2018"))
```
